inclusion.criterion: Primary diagnosis: eating disorder according to DSM IV Criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participated in at least three failed specialized eating disorder treatments
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Having the mental capacity to make provide informed consent to research participation
inclusion.label: met

notes: 62-year-old African-American man with hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism. He smokes cigarette 1 pack per day for 40 years and alcohol consumption of 5 to 6 beers per week.
